            <div class="menu-%e9%a6%96%e9%a1%b5%e8%8f%9c%e5%8d%95-container"><ul id="menu-%e9%a6%96%e9%a1%b5%e8%8f%9c%e5%8d%95-1" class="menu"><li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom current-menu-item current_page_item menu-item-23"><a href="" aria-current="page">首页</a></li>

        <script>
            jQuery(function ($) {


                
                console.log($('.heab_box .open'));
                $('.heab_box .open').click(function () {
                    $('.heab_box .open').css('display', 'none')
                    $('.heab_box .close').css('display', 'block')
                    $('.heab_box .hb_nav').css('display', 'block')
                })
                $('.heab_box .close').click(function () {
                    $('.heab_box .close').css('display', 'none')
                    $('.heab_box .open').css('display', 'block')
                    $('.heab_box .hb_nav').css('display', 'none')
                })
                
                
                // console.log($(".heab_btns .menu li").eq(1))
                
                if(location.pathname==='/'){
                    // console.log(11)
                    $(".heab_logo .menu li").eq(0).find('a').addClass("aact")
                    // console.log($(".heab_btns .menu li").eq(0))
                }else if(location.pathname==='/category/uncategorized/'){
                    // console.log(22)
                    $(".heab_logo .menu li").eq(1).find('a').addClass("aact")
                    // console.log($(".heab_btns .menu li").eq(1))
                }else if(location.pathname==='/issus/'){
                    // console.log(33)
                    $(".heab_logo .menu li").eq(2).find('a').addClass("aact")
                    // console.log($(".heab_btns .menu li").eq(2))
                }else if(location.pathname==='/down' || location.pathname==='/desktop' || location.pathname==='/android' || location.pathname==='/macos'){
                    // console.log(44)
                    $(".heab_logo .menu li").eq(3).find('a').addClass("aact")
                    // console.log($(".heab_btns .menu li").eq(3))
                }
                
            });
        </script>
    </div>

<div class="why-co">
    <div class="wh-top-1">
        <!--<figure>-->
        <!--    <img src="" alt="">-->
        <!--</figure>-->
         <h2>为什么选择Telegram中文版?</h2>
    </div>

    <div class="wh-main">
        <a href="javascript:;">
            <figure>
                <img width="512" height="512" src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/jiandan.gif" alt="" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/jiandan.gif" data-ll-status="loaded" class="entered lazyloaded"><noscript><img width="512" height="512" src="static/picture/jiandan.gif" alt=""></noscript>
            </figure>
            <div>
                <strong>加密</strong>
                <p>Telegram提供端到端加密</p>
                <p>确保仅好有可以阅读消息</p>
            </div>
        </a>
        <a href="javascript:;">
            <figure>
                <img width="512" height="512" src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/simi.gif" alt="" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/simi.gif" data-ll-status="loaded" class="entered lazyloaded"><noscript><img width="512" height="512" src="static/picture/simi.gif" alt=""></noscript>
            </figure>
            <div>
                <strong>群组</strong>
                <p>Telegram中文可以创建</p>
                <p>20万成员的超级群组</p>
            </div>
        </a>
        <a href="javascript:;">
            <figure>
                <img width="512" height="512" src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/d3.gif" alt="" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/d3.gif" data-ll-status="loaded" class="entered lazyloaded"><noscript><img width="512" height="512" src="static/picture/d3.gif" alt=""></noscript>
            </figure>

                <strong>频道</strong>
                <p>Telegram中文版允许用户</p>
                <p>广播消息给无限数量的订阅者</p>
            </div>
        </a>
        <a href="javascript:;">
            <figure>
                <img width="512" height="512" src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/d4.gif" alt="" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/d4.gif" data-ll-status="loaded" class="entered lazyloaded"><noscript><img width="512" height="512" src="static/picture/d4.gif" alt=""></noscript>

                <strong>消息</strong>

            </div>
        </a>

                <strong>分享</strong>
                <p>Telegram支持发送和接收大文件</p>

            </div>
        </a>
        <a href="javascript:;">
            <figure>
                <img width="512" height="512" src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/d6.gif" alt="" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/themes/plan/assets/images/d6.gif" data-ll-status="loaded" class="entered lazyloaded"><noscript><img width="512" height="512" src="static/picture/d6.gif" alt=""></noscript>

    <div class="zx-wen" style="margin-bottom:20px;">
        <!--<figure>-->
        <!--    <img src="" alt="">-->
        <!--</figure>-->
        <h2>最新文章</h2>
    </div>


    <div class="wz-con">
                <a href="958.html">
            <figure>
               <img width="1280" height="720" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201280%20720'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" fetchpriority="high" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3.jpg 1280w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3-300x169.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3-1024x576.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3-768x432.jpg 768w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3.jpg"><noscript><img width="1280" height="720" src="static/picture/maxresdefault-3.jpg" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" fetchpriority="high" srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3.jpg 1280w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3-300x169.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3-1024x576.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/maxresdefault-3-768x432.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px"></noscript>            </figure>
            <div>
                <p class="wz-con-tit">电报只能验证码登录吗？</p>
                <p class="wz-con-con">
                    



电报（Telegram）主要使用手机号码和验证码进行登录。用户首次登录时需要输入手机号码，随后接收并输入一...                                    </p>
                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                <a href="970.html">
            <figure>
               <img width="1500" height="844" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201500%20844'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13.png 1500w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13-300x169.png 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13-1024x576.png 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13-768x432.png 768w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 1500px) 100vw, 1500px" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13.png"><noscript><img width="1500" height="844" src="static/picture/telegram13.png" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13.png 1500w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13-300x169.png 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13-1024x576.png 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/telegram13-768x432.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1500px) 100vw, 1500px"></noscript>            </figure>
            <div>
                <p class="wz-con-tit">Telegram机器人用什么语言开发？</p>
                <p class="wz-con-con">
                    Telegram机器人通常使用Python开发，因为Python具有丰富的库支持，如python-telegram-bot，便于快速开发和部署。此...                                    </p>
                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                <a href="974.html">

               <img width="1500" height="818" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201500%20818'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2.jpeg 1500w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2-300x164.jpeg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2-1024x558.jpeg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2-768x419.jpeg 768w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 1500px) 100vw, 1500px" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2.jpeg"><noscript><img width="1500" height="818" src="static/picture/2.jpeg" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2.jpeg 1500w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2-300x164.jpeg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2-1024x558.jpeg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/2-768x419.jpeg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1500px) 100vw, 1500px"></noscript>            </figure>

                <p class="wz-con-con">

                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                <a href="976.html">
            <figure>

                <p class="wz-con-con">

                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                <a href="978.html">

                <p class="wz-con-tit">Telegram可以创建几个BOT？</p>
                <p class="wz-con-con">
                    








Telegram 用户可以创建多个机器人（BOT），但没有明确限制数量。通常，数量受帐户状态和用途的...                                    </p>
                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>

        </a>
                <a href="980.html">

            <div>
                <p class="wz-con-tit">Telegram可以发多大文件？</p>
                <p class="wz-con-con">
                    Telegram允许用户发送大小最高可达4GB的文件。这适用于所有类型的文件，包括文档、视频和图片。


Telegram文件...                                    </p>
                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                <a href="968.html">
            <figure>
               <img width="1280" height="720" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201280%20720'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497.jpg 1280w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497-300x169.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497-1024x576.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497-768x432.jpg 768w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497.jpg"><noscript><img width="1280" height="720" src="static/picture/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497.jpg" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497.jpg 1280w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497-300x169.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497-1024x576.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/maxresdefault-2024-03-02T130347.497-768x432.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px"></noscript>            </figure>
            <div>
                <p class="wz-con-tit">Telegram如何不让通讯录的人看到我？</p>
                <p class="wz-con-con">
                    在Telegram中，要防止通讯录中的人看到你，可以进入设置，选择“隐私和安全” &gt; “电话号码”，然后将“谁可以看到我...                                    </p>
                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                <a href="982.html">
            <figure>
               <img width="1500" height="818" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201500%20818'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3.jpg 1500w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3-300x164.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3-1024x558.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3-768x419.jpg 768w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 1500px) 100vw, 1500px" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3.jpg"><noscript><img width="1500" height="818" src="static/picture/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-10.jpg" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3.jpg 1500w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3-300x164.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3-1024x558.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/1644499014-0c97040fe2da46a986b9c2ccb471c7b1-3-768x419.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1500px) 100vw, 1500px"></noscript>            </figure>
            <div>
                <p class="wz-con-tit">Telegram手机版怎么解除敏感内容限制？</p>
                <p class="wz-con-con">
                    在Telegram手机版解除敏感内容限制，首先进入“设置”，然后选择“隐私与安全”，在该菜单中找到并进入“敏感内容”设置...                                    </p>
                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                <a href="956.html">
            <figure>
               <img width="1024" height="576" src="data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20576'%3E%3C/svg%3E" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" data-lazy-srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1-300x169.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1-768x432.jpg 768w" data-lazy-sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" data-lazy-src="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1.jpg"><noscript><img width="1024" height="576" src="static/picture/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1.jpg" class="topic-image wp-post-image" alt="" decoding="async" srcset="https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1.jpg 1024w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1-300x169.jpg 300w, https://www.telegram-apk.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/cach-dang-nhap-telegram-khong-can-ma-xac-nhan-0-1024x576-1-768x432.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px"></noscript>            </figure>
            <div>
                <p class="wz-con-tit">Telegram删除帐号对方知道吗？</p>
                <p class="wz-con-con">
                    








当你删除Telegram账号时，对方不会收到官方的通知。但是，你的对话记录会从他们的设备中消失，...                                    </p>
                <p class="wz-con-us">admin</p>
            </div>
        </a>
                
    </div>

</div>
<script>
    $(function(){
        let u = navigator.userAgent;
        let isAndroid = u.indexOf('Android') > -1 || u.indexOf('Adr') > -1;   //判断是否是 android终端
        let isIOS = !!u.match(/\(i[^;]+;( U;)? CPU.+Mac OS X/);     //判断是否是 iOS终端
        console.log('是否是Android：', isAndroid); //true,false
        console.log('是否是iOS：', isIOS)
        if(isAndroid){
            $(".ind-3-1").css({
                "display":'flex'
            })
            $(".ind-3-1 video").css({
                "display":"none"
            })
            // 安卓
            $(".appdown").attr('href','/download.html')
        }else if(isIOS){
            $(".ind-3-2").css({
                "display":'flex'
            })
            // 苹果
            $(".appdown").attr('href','/download.html')
        }else if(!isIOS && !isAndroid){
            // pc
            $(".appdown").attr('href','/download.html')
            $(".ind-3-1 img").css({
                "display":"none"
            })
        }
        
        
    })
</script>

                </div>
            </div>

            </div>
            
            <script>
                    $("#aa-select").change(function() {
            let a = $(this).val();
            // location.href = a;
            window.open(a,'_blank')
        })
            </script>
        </div>
        <div class="foo_bom">
            Copyright@2023 Telegram中文版&amp;AlI Rights Reserved.<a style="color:#26A4E4;" href="sitemap_index.xml">XML地图</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</footer>
	<div style="display:none;"><a href="https://smalltool.github.io/">快速仿站</a></div>

<script>window.lazyLoadOptions=[{elements_selector:"img[data-lazy-src],.rocket-lazyload,iframe[data-lazy-src]",data_src:"lazy-src",data_srcset:"lazy-srcset",data_sizes:"lazy-sizes",class_loading:"lazyloading",class_loaded:"lazyloaded",threshold:300,callback_loaded:function(element){if(element.tagName==="IFRAME"&&element.dataset.rocketLazyload=="fitvidscompatible"){if(element.classList.contains("lazyloaded")){if(typeof window.jQuery!="undefined"){if(jQuery.fn.fitVids){jQuery(element).parent().fitVids()}}}}}},{elements_selector:".rocket-lazyload",data_src:"lazy-src",data_srcset:"lazy-srcset",data_sizes:"lazy-sizes",class_loading:"lazyloading",class_loaded:"lazyloaded",threshold:300,}];window.addEventListener('LazyLoad::Initialized',function(e){var lazyLoadInstance=e.detail.instance;if(window.MutationObserver){var observer=new MutationObserver(function(mutations){var image_count=0;var iframe_count=0;var rocketlazy_count=0;mutations.forEach(function(mutation){for(var i=0;i<mutation.addedNodes.length;i++){if(typeof mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName!=='function'){continue}
if(typeof mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByClassName!=='function'){continue}
images=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('img');is_image=mutation.addedNodes[i].tagName=="IMG";iframes=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('iframe');is_iframe=mutation.addedNodes[i].tagName=="IFRAME";rocket_lazy=mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByClassName('rocket-lazyload');image_count+=images.length;iframe_count+=iframes.length;rocketlazy_count+=rocket_lazy.length;if(is_image){image_count+=1}
if(is_iframe){iframe_count+=1}}});if(image_count>0||iframe_count>0||rocketlazy_count>0){lazyLoadInstance.update()}});var b=document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];var config={childList:!0,subtree:!0};observer.observe(b,config)}},!1)</script><script data-no-minify="1" async="" src="static/js/lazyload.min.js"></script><script>function lazyLoadThumb(e,alt){var t='<img data-lazy-src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ID/hqdefault.jpg" alt="" width="480" height="360"><noscript><img src="https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ID/hqdefault.jpg" alt="" width="480" height="360"></noscript>',a='<button class="play" aria-label="play Youtube video"></button>';t=t.replace('alt=""','alt="'+alt+'"');return t.replace("ID",e)+a}function lazyLoadYoutubeIframe(){var e=document.createElement("iframe"),t="ID?autoplay=1";t+=0===this.parentNode.dataset.query.length?'':'&'+this.parentNode.dataset.query;e.setAttribute("src",t.replace("ID",this.parentNode.dataset.src)),e.setAttribute("frameborder","0"),e.setAttribute("allowfullscreen","1"),e.setAttribute("allow", "accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"),this.parentNode.parentNode.replaceChild(e,this.parentNode)}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){var e,t,p,a=document.getElementsByClassName("rll-youtube-player");for(t=0;t<a.length;t++)e=document.createElement("div"),e.setAttribute("data-id",a[t].dataset.id),e.setAttribute("data-query", a[t].dataset.query),e.setAttribute("data-src", a[t].dataset.src),e.innerHTML=lazyLoadThumb(a[t].dataset.id,a[t].dataset.alt),a[t].appendChild(e),p=e.querySelector('.play'),p.onclick=lazyLoadYoutubeIframe});</script>
